name: Space Queen
description: Space Queen is a legendary hybrid created by famed breeder Vic High of BC Growers Association. A cross between Romulan and Cinderella 99, Space Queen presents a wide array of phenotypes, all of which possess great potency and some variation of a fruity aroma. The most sought after of these is a large, resinous, high yielding plant that smells of apples, vanilla and cherries, and has a delicious cherry taste when properly cured. Although it is a hybrid, Space Queen will give users an intense, trippy, speedy buzz that is characteristic of strong sativas.
descriptionPlain: Space Queen is a legendary hybrid created by famed breeder Vic High of BC Growers Association. A cross between Romulan and Cinderella 99, Space Queen presents a wide array of phenotypes, all of which possess great potency and some variation of a fruity aroma. The most sought after of these is a large, resinous, high yielding plant that smells of apples, vanilla and cherries, and has a delicious cherry taste when properly cured. Although it is a hybrid, Space Queen will give users an intense, trippy, speedy buzz that is characteristic of strong sativas.

highlightedReviews.text: This is my total fave strain ever. I have really bad anxiety and trouble concentrating on a good day and not all buds are good for that. I'm very hesitant with new strains and after trying Space queen I fell in love. Literally. I like to do things while I smoke. Be productive.. And enjoy it. I don't like the super strong couch coma buds. This one was clean and amazing and just great. Absolutely no paranoia or franticness. Highly recommend for that anxious person who can't quite relax.
One of my fave strains! This gives you a really nice trippy, creative high. It’s awesome.

articles.title: Leafly’s Faves 2017: Concentrates
articles.author: Leafly Staff
articles.text:
Leafly’s Faves is a series providing a glimpse into the strains, products, and brands that our team of cannabis aficionados is buying, consuming, and enjoying the most every year. Some are entirely new to the market, while others are simply perennial favorites that we can’t recommend enough. Below, find our crew’s favorite cannabis concentrates of 2017. How many have you tried? What was your favorite concentrate of 2017? Share with us in the comments below!

Double Tangie Banana Sugar Resin by Oleum Extracts
Available in: Washington
Bursting with citrus aroma, Oleum Extracts’ delicious Double Tangie Banana Sugar Resin brings maximum flavor along with buzzy sativa-dominant qualities. We love it for its huge terpene profile, and find it to beget a subtle, controllable high with each and every dab.
Space Queen Cartridge by Artizen Cannabis
Available in: Washington
Notes of bold cherry mixed with a soft vanilla scent are found in Artizen’s hybrid Space Queen Cartridge. We recommend this delectable concentrate for beginners and newbies as it delivers a well-balanced high and sweet taste that will keep you (and us) coming back for more.
Harley Twin CBD Sap by Cannavative
Available in: Nevada
Packed with 57.6mg CBD to 23.3mg THC, we’re loving Cannavative’s pain-crushing Harley Twin CBD Sap. Wrap yourself in a stimulating buzz with a healthy dab of this sativa strain before taking on the day.

CHILL Cartridge by SuicideGirls Cannabis
Available in: California
The Suicide Girls released a line of effects-based cartridges that will perfectly match your mood, and we’ve been getting up close and personal with their relaxing CHILL Cartridge filled with a whopping 80% THC and mouthwatering fruity terpenes.
Also featured in: We Tried the Suicide Girls’ New Cannabis Vape Line
Green Crack Distillate Cartridge by Bullet Concentrates
Available in: Nevada
Bullet Concentrates’ Silver Bullet Distillate Cartridges are as effective as they are elevating, and the Green Crack Cartridge is no exception. We’ve been including it as part of a balanced wake and bake morning for its burst of energy and robust terpene profile.
THCA Crystalline Distillate by Oleum Extracts
Available in: Washington
Oleum Extracts comes up time and again when we talk great local concentrates, and their potent THCA Crystalline Distillate is a favorite amongst our more experienced concentrate lovers. When pressed on a hot dab nail, THCA decarboxylates into strong and active THC. With little to no terpene content in a crystalline distillate, the rush is smooth and tasteless, and these crystals can be added to standard dabs for an intense high-potency experience (trust us, it’ll feel like you’re taking your first dab all over again).

Tropical Trainwreck 1g Kit by Orchid Essentials
Available in: California and Oregon
Leafly’s office is located in Seattle, which means we clamor for any product that lets us escape from the clouds and rain. Enter the Tropical Trainwreck Cartridge Kit by Orchid Essentials, loaded with tropical terpenes boasting citrus and pineapple flavors. It’s as close to sitting on a sunny beach as we can get.
FreshTerps by Evolab
Available in: Colorado
Evolab’s FreshTerps is a step up in the world of cannabis flavors and aroma. We’ve fallen head over heels for this concentrate, which contains about 90% terpenes (plus 10% THC) and can be vaped individually or blended with your favorite oils to produce the most delicious dabs you’ve ever had.
Also featured in: Best Products to Pick Up Before 4/20
Eureka Clear Disposable Vape Pen in Indica by Eureka Vapor
Available in: California and Colorado
With 300mg of cannabinoids, Eureka’s calming Disposable Vape Pen has our indica lovers singing its praises. Featuring classic indica strains like Granddaddy Purple and Skywalker and a full test analysis for each pen, we admire Eureka Vapor’s attention to quality and ease of use.
Also featured in: 10 Brands Making Awesome Disposable Cannabis Vape Pens

Red Apple Clear Cartridge by The Clear
Available in: California, Colorado, and Oregon
The Clear brings the sweet and crisp fragrance of a fresh apple orchard right to your lips with their half-gram Red Apple Clear Cartridge. We can also get down with The Clear’s other cartridges featuring a wide range of delicious flavors (once you’re done with Red Apple, try the lush Orange Cream).
Also featured in: In Photos: These ‘Dragon Balls’ Contain 3,000 Grams of Pure Cannabis Oil
Chemmy Jones Blonde BHO by Dorado Extracts
Available in: Washington
Dorado Extracts’ extra-terpy Chemmy Jones Blonde BHO provides an ultra-rich taste with a high-energy buzz. We especially love their innovative soft lid packaging and quality concentrate at a budget-friendly price point.
Also featured in: What Are Your Smoking? Episode 17
Super Lemon Haze Vape Cartridge by The Bloom Brand
Available in: California and Washington
Free of solvents, lipids, waxes, and impurities, The Bloom Brand’s Super Lemon Haze Vape Cartridges are triple distilled and contain only oil and terpenes, giving you an ultra-pure cannabis concentrate.
Lead image by rgbspace/iStock

articles.title: Leafly's Faves 2017: Strains
articles.author: Leafly Staff
articles.text:
Leafly’s Faves is a series providing a glimpse into the strains, products, and brands that our team of cannabis aficionados is buying, consuming, and enjoying the most every year. Some are entirely new to the market, while others are simply perennial favorites that we can’t recommend enough. Below, find our crew’s favorite cannabis strains of 2017. How many have you tried? What was your favorite strain of 2017? Share with us in the comments below!

Plushberry
An introspective indica that won’t put you to sleep, Plushberry is the perfect strain for enjoying some peace and quiet. Relax with the aroma of lavender wrapped up in this cross of two more of our faves: Space Queen and Black Cherry Soda.
Also featured in:

The 100 Cannabis Strains You Must Try Before You Die
11 Unsung Cannabis Strains Worth Discovering

Lemonder
For a light, euphoric strain that offers bright flavors of lemon and pine, track down the balanced Seattle-native hybrid Lemonder. A cross between Lavender, Super Lemon Haze, and OG Kush, we love its mentally stimulating qualities that don’t overwhelm.
Also featured in:

The 100 Cannabis Strains You Must Try Before You Die
What Are You Smoking? Episode 18
The Top THC-Dominant Strains of Washington State in Fall 2017

Allen Wrench
A child of popular parents (Trainwreck and NYC Diesel), the sour sativa Allen Wrench packs a punch of upbeat energy. We love harnessing its powerful cerebral qualities and energy-boosting characteristics on busy days.
Also featured in:

The 100 Cannabis Strains You Must Try Before You Die
6 Cannabis Strains to Help You Stay Productive
These Cannabis Strains All Have Unique Cannabinoids


Dutchberry
Ringing in at around 8% CBD and 27% THC, the giggle-inducing hybrid Dutchberry takes on the best attributes of its Dutch Treat and DJ Short Blueberry parents. A particularly delicious strain, we can’t get enough of the berry and citrus flavors that accompany this happy high.
Also featured in: Smoke This, Play That Vol. 4
Sunset Sherbet
The potent hybrid Sunset Sherbet is a powerful, full-body strain that will take you to new heights with its cerebral stimulation. We’ve been filling our bongs with a hefty dose to melt away stress and bask in a richly euphoric high.
Also featured in:

The 100 Cannabis Strains You Must Try Before You Die
The 10 Cannabis Strains You Must Try This Summer
Top Trending Strains of 2015
Tips for Growing Sunset Sherbet Cannabis

Dark Side of the Moon
Inspired by the famous Pink Floyd album, Dark Side of The Moon is a sweet indica that we like to reserve for right before bedtime. For the perfect nightcap after a stressful day, we recommend packing your favorite pipe and slipping into an elevated slumber.
Also featured in: May the Fourth Be With You: The Best Strains to Celebrate the Galactic Star Wars Holiday

Space Queen
With sweet dessert aromas including notes of vanilla, cherry, and apple, the hybrid Space Queen helped us stay upbeat in 2017. Perfect for daytime use, Space Queen’s sativa qualities deliver a buzzy kick that will keep you going (despite its indica Romulan roots).
Also featured in:

The 100 Cannabis Strains You Must Try Before You Die
Celebrate 10 Famous 4/20 Birthdays With These Strain Pairings
Which Cannabis Strain Pairs Best With your Zodiac Sign?
7 ‘Eye Candy’ Movies to Pair With Your Favorite Strain

White Tahoe Cookies
The strong indica that is White Tahoe Cookies was practically made for lazy days. With sedative effects that build with each hit, you’ll want to park somewhere comfortable and clear your schedule for a cozy day in (we’ve found White Tahoe Cookies to be very hyggelig).
Harlequin
The CBD-rich sativa Harlequin delivers a stress-melting 5:2 CBD:THC ratio that expertly crushes anxiety and pain without the intoxicating effects. A Columbia Gold and Swiss landrace descendant, Harlequin is a preferred strain for those among us who are medical patients as well as the many of us who simply love CBD.
Also featured in:

The 100 Cannabis Strains You Must Try Before You Die
Tips for Growing Harlequin Cannabis
7 High-Energy Strains to Help You Get Active and Fight Fatigue
High CBD Products for Medical Marijuana Patients
What Are the Best Cannabis Stains for Pain?


Dancehall
Suitable for social gatherings and celebratory occasions, the hybrid Dancehall is an aptly named energy-boosting strain. We’ve been loading up our vaporizers before concerts, parties, festivals, and all manner of exciting events.
Also featured in:

The 100 Cannabis Strains You Must Try Before You Die
11 Unsung Cannabis Strains Worth Discovering

Purple Trainwreck
Born from the powerhouse combination of Trainwreck and Mendocino Purps, hybrid Purple Trainwreck is the go-to strain for laughing fits and cerebral stimulation. We’ve been keeping it on hand for its tasty notes of pine, lavender, and citrus.
Also featured in:

Tips for Growing Purple Trainwreck Cannabis
10 Products to Pick Up Before 4/20
The 10 Cannabis Strains You Must Try This Summer

Lead image by Julia Sumpter/Leafly

growInfo.growNotes:
Good for sea of green (SOG) or screen of green (SCROG) operations
	Stretches tall during the first 3 weeks of flowering
	Reservoir Seeds recommends a soil pH level of 5.8 to 6.0
	Grows best in warm, slightly arid environments up to 88°F (31°C) and rich in CO2

name: Space Queen
description: Space Queen is a legendary hybrid created by famed breeder Vic High of BC Growers Association. A cross between Romulan and Cinderella 99, Space Queen presents a wide array of phenotypes, all of which possess great potency and some variation of a fruity aroma. The most sought after of these is a large, resinous, high yielding plant that smells of apples, vanilla and cherries, and has a delicious cherry taste when properly cured. Although it is a hybrid, Space Queen will give users an intense, trippy, speedy buzz that is characteristic of strong sativas.
descriptionPlain: Space Queen is a legendary hybrid created by famed breeder Vic High of BC Growers Association. A cross between Romulan and Cinderella 99, Space Queen presents a wide array of phenotypes, all of which possess great potency and some variation of a fruity aroma. The most sought after of these is a large, resinous, high yielding plant that smells of apples, vanilla and cherries, and has a delicious cherry taste when properly cured. Although it is a hybrid, Space Queen will give users an intense, trippy, speedy buzz that is characteristic of strong sativas.

highlightedReviews.text: This is my total fave strain ever. I have really bad anxiety and trouble concentrating on a good day and not all buds are good for that. I'm very hesitant with new strains and after trying Space queen I fell in love. Literally. I like to do things while I smoke. Be productive.. And enjoy it. I don't like the super strong couch coma buds. This one was clean and amazing and just great. Absolutely no paranoia or franticness. Highly recommend for that anxious person who can't quite relax.
One of my fave strains! This gives you a really nice trippy, creative high. It’s awesome.

What was your favorite strain of 2017? Share with us in the comments below!

Plushberry
An introspective indica that won’t put you to sleep, Plushberry is the perfect strain for enjoying some peace and quiet. Relax with the aroma of lavender wrapped up in this cross of two more of our faves: Space Queen and Black Cherry Soda.
Also featured in:

The 100 Cannabis Strains You Must Try Before You Die
11 Unsung Cannabis Strains Worth Discovering

Lemonder
For a light, euphoric strain that offers bright flavors of lemon and pine, track down the balanced Seattle-native hybrid Lemonder. A cross between Lavender, Super Lemon Haze, and OG Kush, we love its mentally stimulating qualities that don’t overwhelm.
Also featured in:

The 100 Cannabis Strains You Must Try Before You Die
What Are You Smoking? Episode 18
The Top THC-Dominant Strains of Washington State in Fall 2017

Allen Wrench
A child of popular parents (Trainwreck and NYC Diesel), the sour sativa Allen Wrench packs a punch of upbeat energy. We love harnessing its powerful cerebral qualities and energy-boosting characteristics on busy days.
Also featured in:

The 100 Cannabis Strains You Must Try Before You Die
6 Cannabis Strains to Help You Stay Productive
These Cannabis Strains All Have Unique Cannabinoids


Dutchberry
Ringing in at around 8% CBD and 27% THC, the giggle-inducing hybrid Dutchberry takes on the best attributes of its Dutch Treat and DJ Short Blueberry parents. A particularly delicious strain, we can’t get enough of the berry and citrus flavors that accompany this happy high.
Also featured in: Smoke This, Play That Vol. 4
Sunset Sherbet
The potent hybrid Sunset Sherbet is a powerful, full-body strain that will take you to new heights with its cerebral stimulation. We’ve been filling our bongs with a hefty dose to melt away stress and bask in a richly euphoric high.
Also featured in:

The 100 Cannabis Strains You Must Try Before You Die
The 10 Cannabis Strains You Must Try This Summer
Top Trending Strains of 2015
Tips for Growing Sunset Sherbet Cannabis

Dark Side of the Moon
Inspired by the famous Pink Floyd album, Dark Side of The Moon is a sweet indica that we like to reserve for right before bedtime. For the perfect nightcap after a stressful day, we recommend packing your favorite pipe and slipping into an elevated slumber.
Also featured in: May the Fourth Be With You: The Best Strains to Celebrate the Galactic Star Wars Holiday

Space Queen
With sweet dessert aromas including notes of vanilla, cherry, and apple, the hybrid Space Queen helped us stay upbeat in 2017. Perfect for daytime use, Space Queen’s sativa qualities deliver a buzzy kick that will keep you going (despite its indica Romulan roots).
Also featured in:

The 100 Cannabis Strains You Must Try Before You Die
Celebrate 10 Famous 4/20 Birthdays With These Strain Pairings
Which Cannabis Strain Pairs Best With your Zodiac Sign?
7 ‘Eye Candy’ Movies to Pair With Your Favorite Strain

White Tahoe Cookies
The strong indica that is White Tahoe Cookies was practically made for lazy days. With sedative effects that build with each hit, you’ll want to park somewhere comfortable and clear your schedule for a cozy day in (we’ve found White Tahoe Cookies to be very hyggelig).
Harlequin
The CBD-rich sativa Harlequin delivers a stress-melting 5:2 CBD:THC ratio that expertly crushes anxiety and pain without the intoxicating effects. A Columbia Gold and Swiss landrace descendant, Harlequin is a preferred strain for those among us who are medical patients as well as the many of us who simply love CBD.
Also featured in:

Dancehall
Suitable for social gatherings and celebratory occasions, the hybrid Dancehall is an aptly named energy-boosting strain. We’ve been loading up our vaporizers before concerts, parties, festivals, and all manner of exciting events.
Also featured in:

The 100 Cannabis Strains You Must Try Before You Die
11 Unsung Cannabis Strains Worth Discovering

Purple Trainwreck
Born from the powerhouse combination of Trainwreck and Mendocino Purps, hybrid Purple Trainwreck is the go-to strain for laughing fits and cerebral stimulation. We’ve been keeping it on hand for its tasty notes of pine, lavender, and citrus.

growInfo.growNotes:
Good for sea of green (SOG) or screen of green (SCROG) operations
	Stretches tall during the first 3 weeks of flowering
	Reservoir Seeds recommends a soil pH level of 5.8 to 6.0
	Grows best in warm, slightly arid environments up to 88°F (31°C) and rich in CO2
